name: WarBirds Fighter Pilot Academy
description:
Fighter Aircraft Combat Simulator in historically accurate World War II campaigns with P-51Ds, Spitfires, P-38 Lightning fighters! Fly and Fight in Europe, from the 1940 Phony War to the 1945 V-E Day. Fly 24 fully modeled Allied fighter aircraft including the British Hurricane and the famous P-47D Thunderbolt in realistic 3D terrains. Real flying skills are need to fight, survive, and help to win World War II in the air!

• Challenging missions from training, to defending your airfield, to escorting the mighty B-17 Flying Fortress bombers into Axis Europe.
• 13 Separate and Historic WW II Campaigns.
• Three Combat Missions per Campaign.
• Realistically modeled fighter aircraft from the B239 Brewster F2A Buffalo, the Supermarine Spitfire IX, to the mighty P-51D Mustang!
• European and African combat terrains, with good landings required to complete your missions.
• Earn your Wings, Medals, and Rank by accomplishing combat missions.
• Sophisticated AI modeling will require realistic combat maneuvering to beat the enemy!
• If you cannot win, Bail Out, and go again!
